# Value

**Associated Type**

The associated type representing the type of the environment key’s value.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Value
```

## Getting the default value

- **defaultValue**: The default value for the environment key.

items.description: The default value for the environment key.
items.name: defaultValue
